summary: Experienced Full Stack Engineer with a strong background in developing scalable applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Proven expertise in integrating payment systems and optimizing backend performance for FinTech solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed a cross-platform mobile application enhancing user experience and integrating secure payment processing with Stripe, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.
Optimized backend performance for scalability, reducing server response time by 40%.

experience.title: AI Software Engineer
achievements: Contributed to a SaaS platform integrating AI-driven features, automating lead generation and enhancing user engagement by 25%.
Improved system performance and data flow, supporting intelligent business insights and increasing platform efficiency by 20%.

experience.title: Computer Vision Developer
achievements: Developed a Facial Emotion Recognition system using CNN and VGG19 models, achieving 85% accuracy in emotion detection.
Created a user-friendly web interface for image uploads and prediction visualization, enhancing usability and interpretability.

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed an intuitive web interface for the Nuclei vulnerability scanner, simplifying security scan configuration and execution.
Enabled users with limited security experience to manage templates and visualize results, improving accessibility and user satisfaction.

experience.title: Web Developer
achievements: Designed a modern UI for a talent hiring platform, aligning UX/UI with brand messaging and increasing user engagement by 15%.
Enhanced conversion-focused workflows, simplifying navigation and improving overall platform usability.
